p: The name proposed for the disease caused by NiV infection of pigs was “porcine respiratory and neurological syndrome” (also known as “porcine respiratory and encephalitis syndrome”), or, in peninsular Malaysia, “barking pig syndrome” ( 28). NiV infection was included as the sixth pig disease notifiable to the OIE World Organization for Animal Health ( 31). The OIE approve diagnostics and recommends preventative and control measures for a range of transboundary livestock diseases.
